code: @Test public void testDeadLetterChannelOnPrepare() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:dead").expectedBodiesReceived("Hello World").     getMockEndpoint("mock:dead").expectedHeaderReceived("FailedBecause", "Forced").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     Exception cause = exchange.getProperty(Exchange.EXCEPTION_CAUGHT, Exception.class).     exchange.getIn().setHeader("FailedBecause", cause.getMessage()). }
